true.text: Lucosa. May I ask you a question?

false.text: Little Ruirui. May I ask you a question?

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Uh, sure? Who are you, exactly?

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: My name is Derenisa. Now, would you mind telling me your business here?

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: I'm... just climbing the waterfall. That's all.

dialogue.speaker: Derenisa
dialogue.text: Climbing the waterfall, are you? How very brave. Especially with a criminal on the loose.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: A Shifter. Caught in the town earlier today. It ran off in this direction. And I plan to catch it.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: Yes, that "shapeshifter." The same one that ran off in this direction. I plan on catching it, actually.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: (Oh no... she's definitely talking about me...)

true.speaker: Derenisa
true.text: Say, you look like an honest guy. You wouldn't happen to have a lead on it's whereabouts, would you?

false.speaker: Derenisa
false.text: Say, you look like a nice girl. You wouldn't happen to have a lead on it's whereabouts, would you?

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Of course! I think I saw it run that way, past the campfire.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: Hmph. Wonderful. I'll have my catch in no time. Thank you, citizen.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: Really? You sounded quite eager to answer my question.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: S-sorry, just nerves, from the big scary Shifer on the loose... Heh heh...

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: ...Sure. Well, I will continue my search then. Let me know if you see anything.

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: You will be the first to know!

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: Why should I tell you anything?

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: Ohh, so you are a rebel now? Well, let me tell you something, miss.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: I am an officer of the Lucosan Royal Guard. And you are a peasant. If you are hiding that Shifter's whereabouts from me, you'll be on the same road to prison. Understand?

path.speaker: Rez
path.text: I think they ran that way, past the campfire.

path.speaker: Derenisa
path.text: Thank you, citizen. If you keep doing as you're told, this won't be an issue again. Be glad I showed you mercy.
